original_text: But of the children of Israel did Solomon make no servants for his work; but they were men of war, and chief of his captains, and captains of his chariots and horsemen.
korean_text: 오직 이스라엘 자손은 솔로몬이 노예로 삼아 일을 시키지 아니하였으니 그들은 군사와 지휘관의 우두머리들과 그의 병거와 마병의 지휘관들이 됨이라

sentences.original_text: But of the children of Israel
did Solomon make no servants for his work
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 자기 일을 위해 종으로 삼지 아니하였으니

sentences.original_text: but they were men of war
and captains of his chariots and horsemen
